title: Beninos Men's Dress Shirts Casual Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt
description: Long sleeve button down dress shirt for men.
No Pocket / Smooth. Choose your normally size.
In theory, this collar fits all face shapes, so it's the most common and safe shirt.
Regular sleeve type, two buttons, can adjust cuff tightness according to wrist thickness.
Features: button-front dress shirt, classic plaid. Usually with a jacket, tie and a suit or formalwear, but this shirts are also worn casually too.
